task.title: Parking at Virginia Tech
task.shortdesc: In order to park at Virginia Tech without getting your vehicle towed or ticketed, you will need a Visitor's parking pass.

step.cmd: Visit Parking Services at 605 Research Center Dr. It is located in between Lane Stadium and the Corporate Research Center.
Go inside and give the worker your name and license plate number.
You will be given a parking pass, along with a document informing you of places you are able to legally park. Use it accordingly .
Hang the parking pass on your rearview mirror, or place it in the dashboard so it is visible outside of the vehicle.
